summary: okay but like harry potter au where in first year when harry first meets draco, draco doesnt act like a little shit, he acts...
body: okay but like harry potter au where in first year when harry first meets draco, draco doesnt act like a little shit, he acts friendly and polite and nice and harry actually accepts his handshake cause -idc if u dont agree w/ me- all draco ever wanted was to be harry’s friend and they do become friends like imagine how much they would have helped each other, like harry would have include draco in his group of friends and draco would finally feel accepted, like he has people by his side, he would talk about thw shit he’s going through at home, he would have a shoulder to cry, someone to cheer him up

tags: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
summary: Happy Birthday!! I know. I’m terribly late. Sorry Ron !!! Anyway ... Happy Birthday Ronald !! ... it’s 12 days too late, but you...
caption:
Happy Birthday!!

I know. I’m terribly late. Sorry Ron !!!
Anyway … Happy Birthday Ronald !! … it’s 12 days too late, but you forgive me… don’t you? :’)

(The tribute to Remus will come soon, who he had a birthday 3 days ago …)

“You’ve sort of made up for it tonight,’ said Harry. ‘Getting the sword. Finishing off the Horcux. Saving my life.’
'That makes me sound a lot cooler than I was,’ Ron mumbled.
'Stuff like that always sounds cooler than it really was,’ said Harry. 'I’ve been trying to tell you that for years.’
Simultaneously they walked forwards and hugged, Harry gripping the still sopping back of Ron’s jacket.”
― J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

summary:
Hermione: Harry doesn't know you're flirting...
Draco: Don't worry I have a plan
*Harry walks in*
Draco: *screaming* AE TATTI...
body:
Hermione: Harry doesn’t know you’re flirting…

Draco: Don’t worry I have a plan

*Harry walks in*

Draco: *screaming* AE TATTI TERA NAAM KYA HAI?!!?!?!?

My interests on Tumblr are generally anything Harry Potter, Yo-Kai Watch, Skyrim (video games in general, really), Bionicle, or Death Note, and also guinea pigs and rabbits, and I ship Wolfstar! I hope you don't hate my blog!

summary:
Remus: S-Sirius... don't do this...
Sirius: I-I can't... I can't help it, Remus...
Remus: Please... Sirius... you can't do...
body:
Remus: S-Sirius… don’t do this…

Sirius: I-I can’t… I can’t help it, Remus…

Remus: Please… Sirius… you can’t do this!

Sirius: I’m sorry…

Sirius: *opens carton of custard*

Remus:

Sirius:

Remus: I thought you were going to drink it out if the carton.

Sirius: How dare you! I wouldn’t do that!

Sirius: But Padfoot would!

Sirius: *turns into a dog, knocks the carton over and laps up the spilled custard*

Remus:

summary: Was Voldemort's action of taking Harry's blood to recreate his body acting something like a "blood pact"?
body:
Was Voldemort’s action of taking Harry’s blood to recreate his body acting something like a “blood pact”?

Voldemort took Harry’s blood to recreate his body.

Now I was thinking was THAT acting like a blood pact?

One can argue that it doesn’t because Harry finally WAS able to kill Riddle. But think about this.

Harry’s blood was forcibly taken. Meaning he didn’t give his consent to it. But on the other hand, Riddle willingly took his enemy’s blood. And thus Lily’s protection transferred to his body too making it impossible for Harry to die unless Voldemort is killed 1st. But Harry was able to kill Riddle because he didn’t consent to it.

So Voldemort became the blood pact that has to destroyed 1st so that one could harm Harry.

Or should we say Voldemort became like a horcrux for Harry until he died.

I know this might sound absurd but I was reading deathly hallows yesterday & this thought suddenly came up.

Now I was thinking was THAT acting like a blood pact?

One can argue that it doesn’t because Harry finally WAS able to kill Riddle. But think about this.

Harry’s blood was forcibly taken. Meaning he didn’t give his consent to it. But on the other hand, Riddle willingly took his enemy’s blood. And thus Lily’s protection transferred to his body too making it impossible for Harry to die unless Voldemort is killed 1st. But Harry was able to kill Riddle because he didn’t consent to it.

So Voldemort became the blood pact that has to destroyed 1st so that one could harm Harry.

Or should we say Voldemort became like a horcrux for Harry until he died.

I know this might sound absurd but I was reading deathly hallows yesterday & this thought suddenly came up.

l'objectif de ce tumblr est de rassembler en un seul et même endroit les icons 100x100 & 200x200. si vous souhaitez contribuer à ce stock, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter (ask ou mp), ou bien à mettre le tag #100disorders dans vos posts, nous vous rebloguerons ici avec plaisir. Pour réduire les liens, vous pouvez utiliser bitly & tinyurl. Merci de créditer les créateurs des icons! bonne visite,

l'équipe de 100D

summary: Daniel Radcliffe se deja crecer la melena para un thriller a lo Prision Break
title: Daniel Radcliffe se deja crecer la melena para un thriller a lo Prision Break
body:
La estrella de Harry Potter continúa dejando al niño mago en el pasado, apostando por un thriller con tintes a lo Prision Break y nuevo look incluido. Barba, incipiente bigote, rizos y melena al cuello. Así aparece Daniel Radcliffe en la primera imagen promocional de Escape from Petroria, un thriller basado en una historia real que actualmente rueda en Australia.

La película relatará el escape de Jenkin y Lee, dos sudafricanos que fueron encarcelados por terrorismo en 1978 por su relación en el encubrimiento de operaciones antiapartheid para el ANC (Congreso Nacional Africano).

Presos en la prisión de máxima seguridad de Pretoria, consiguieron escapar tras pasar meses estudiando las medidas de vigilancia y crear diez llaves de madera para cada una de las puertas de acero que los separaban de la libertad.

La cinta parte de la autobiografía escrita por el propio Tim Jenkin y está siendo dirigida por el británico Francis Annan en su debut detrás de las cámaras. Se trata de una coproducción entre Australia y Reino Unido, con el actor inglés compartiendo protagonismo con el australiano Daniel Webber.

La película ya se rueda en Adelaide, la ciudad costera de la parte sur del océano Índico, en donde Daniel está causando conmoción entre los vecinos hasta el punto de ser noticia en los telediarios locales.

One of the city’s busiest streets has been transformed into a set for a major film production, starring former boy wizard Daniel Radcliffe. @NatarjshaKramer #9News pic.twitter.com/CkaRdDejZQ

— Nine News Adelaide (@9NewsAdel) March 13, 2019

¿Qué te parece el nuevo look de Radcliffe?

Para seguir leyendo:
Daniel Radcliffe bebía alcohol en exceso para lidiar con la fama de Harry Potter
Daniel Radcliffe responde a los rumores de que reemplazará a Hugh Jackman como Lobezno
Desvelan que la cicatriz de Harry Potter no es un rayo y los fans se quedan boquiabiertos

Ian Routledge/Arclight Films

La película relatará el escape de Jenkin y Lee, dos sudafricanos que fueron encarcelados por terrorismo en 1978 por su relación en el encubrimiento de operaciones antiapartheid para el ANC (Congreso Nacional Africano).

Presos en la prisión de máxima seguridad de Pretoria, consiguieron escapar tras pasar meses estudiando las medidas de vigilancia y crear diez llaves de madera para cada una de las puertas de acero que los separaban de la libertad.

La cinta parte de la autobiografía escrita por el propio Tim Jenkin y está siendo dirigida por el británico Francis Annan en su debut detrás de las cámaras. Se trata de una coproducción entre Australia y Reino Unido, con el actor inglés compartiendo protagonismo con el australiano Daniel Webber.

La película ya se rueda en Adelaide, la ciudad costera de la parte sur del océano Índico, en donde Daniel está causando conmoción entre los vecinos hasta el punto de ser noticia en los telediarios locales.

One of the city’s busiest streets has been transformed into a set for a major film production, starring former boy wizard Daniel Radcliffe. @NatarjshaKramer #9News pic.twitter.com/CkaRdDejZQ

— Nine News Adelaide (@9NewsAdel) March 13, 2019

¿Qué te parece el nuevo look de Radcliffe?

Para seguir leyendo:
Daniel Radcliffe bebía alcohol en exceso para lidiar con la fama de Harry Potter
Daniel Radcliffe responde a los rumores de que reemplazará a Hugh Jackman como Lobezno
Desvelan que la cicatriz de Harry Potter no es un rayo y los fans se quedan boquiabiertos

blog.name: regalgeek
blog.title: I fangirl too much
blog.description: Hi, I'm Pen, a fan of way too many morally ambiguous middle-aged fictional women.My current fandoms are mostly OUAT, CAOS, and TWW. I also post some writing things here, sometimes.

tags: its half crack half kinda serious
And is canon compliant besides the fact that these three are interacting together
All three of them are tired and term hasn't even started yet
summary: Deputy Headmistresses Anonymous - Chapter 1 - regalgeek - The Worst Witch (TV 2017) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Deputy Headmistresses Anonymous - Chapter 1 - regalgeek - The Worst Witch (TV 2017) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Hecate Hardbroom, Minerva Mcgonagall, and Glynda Goodwitch had a friendship based on their similar personalities, and circumstances. Namely, how utterly maddening it was to be the the deputy headmistress of a school with trouble making students, magical powers, a school head more than willing to bend the rules, and a rather unfortunate amount of outsider interference.

Or, once a month the three of them get together to rant about whatever is happening in their canon storyline, in an impromptu support group for overworked deputy headmistresses.

I can’t believe i’m actually writing this. And that my muse insisted on this absolute ridiculousness being an actual story and not just a oneshot. Or that I had this idea at all. Whatever the case may be, I hope anyone and everyone interested enjoys.

summary:
A matter of time - tomoewantsdolls Written for Drarryland 2019  Rating: T Wordcount: 835 Prompt:  “
Harry thinks Draco works a...
body:
A matter of time

- tomoewantsdolls

Written for Drarryland 2019

Rating: T

Wordcount: 835

Prompt:  “ Harry thinks Draco works a boring desk job at Gringotts until he finds a clear photograph of Draco dated 1912.”

Summary:   Harry is on a case, Draco is nowhere to be seen

Read on AO3

—

The house was empty by eight o'clock and only Harry remained. He searched methodically, room by room, determined to find any clue he had missed by sheer stubbornness.

The dark witch they had been tracking had disappeared into thin air hours before. She went inside the house and then… nothing. The anti-apparition wards were in place but none of the five Aurors that kept vigilance saw her going out again.

After six hours searching, everyone had gathered all of the relevant artifacts for their study and left, but Harry wasn’t satisfied. He started searching in reverse order hoping for something to stand out of place and, in the last room he checked on the second floor he saw it: a book in the library. It only stood out because the name on the spine was from top to bottom, and he had to cock his head to the other side to read it. He double checked that it was the only one upside down.

“A matter of time” he read. Inside, the pages were blank except for a note on the first one. Are you a friend or a foe? He frowned. “A friend?”

The words changed then and he almost dropped the book. You aren’t sure?

He didn’t trust sentient books since he was twelve, but on the inside he was still that reckless boy, so he answered, obviously. “It depends on who you are.”

 Ah, of course. Well, I’m no one. You?

“I’m no one, too.”

A moment and then Liar.

Harry snorted and put the book in his robes. He didn’t have the energy to deal with this right now. He wanted to finish with the attic and then go home to rest.

Almost an hour later he stood in the middle of the dusty room, hands on his hips and grime all over his robes. He had a nagging feeling that he was missing something and the weight in his pocket could be of help. His first thought was about Hermione and her recurrent, indignant lecture about inappropriate acts of stupidity and misplaced sense of duty that makes him take unnecessary risks, or something along those lines. Well, no doubt she was right, she always is, but he opened the book anyway.

 Are you a friend or a foe?

“A friend.”

 Would you help me?

Harry pondered, of course he didn’t expect it to be easy. “Would anybody be hurt?”

Probably me. A beat, and then: Maybe you.

He frowned. “Is someone in danger?”

 Me.

The moment he made his decision clear the book gave him instructions and about half an hour later he was seated on the stairs, the seventh step broken and a tin can on his lap. Inside were some newspaper clippings and a couple of photos. The first was of the house, in a better state than it was now; the second was a portrait of a young man, maybe in his 30s, leaning on a cane and looking directly to the camera. Harry squinted and turned the photo to check the back. It could have been Draco Malfoy if the photo wasn’t dated 1912.

Harry rubbed his face; he was exhausted. He decided he would sleep on all of this and study his findings tomorrow. Maybe he could go to Gringotts and ask Malfoy about a lost relative or a doppelganger.

The next day, he detoured on his way to work and stopped at Gringotts. The goblin he asked told him that it was Mister Malfoy’s day off, so he went back the next day, and the day after; the goblin he talked to grew more and more annoyed each visit. He was at his desk musing about this and his case stalemate when Hermione knocked at his door.

“Hullo Harry. Do you want to have lunch together?”

“Hmm.”

“What’s the matter?”

“It’s just this case. I’m stuck, and I thought I had a clue but haven’t been able to talk to Malfoy and ask him about it.”

“Do you want to talk about it? Sometimes it helps to talk about things out loud.”

Harry opened the folder and handed the photos and the newspaper clippings to her. When she looked at the photo of the young man, her eyes widened.

“Wow. It certainly looks like Malfoy.” She turned the photo and looked at the inscription at the back. “Interesting.”

“What is it?” He said.

“When did you find it?”

“Three days ago.”

She smiled. “This photo was taken exactly 100 years ago.”
Harry frowned and fixed his gaze on the photograph; the unwavering gaze of the man was disconcerting. Then he blinked, and Harry startled because he had thought the photo was muggle. He took it and looked closely at it. The man was motionless for a little while until he blinked again, then he reached with his free hand to lift his sleeve. Before the loop restarted, he was able to glimpse the tail of the serpent of Malfoy’s faded Dark Mark.

“Holy shit.”
body_abstract:
A matter of time

- tomoewantsdolls

The next day, he detoured on his way to work and stopped at Gringotts. The goblin he asked told him that it was Mister Malfoy’s day off, so he went back the next day, and the day after; the goblin he talked to grew more and more annoyed each visit. He was at his desk musing about this and his case stalemate when Hermione knocked at his door.

“Hullo Harry. Do you want to have lunch together?”

“Hmm.”

“What’s the matter?”

“It’s just this case. I’m stuck, and I thought I had a clue but haven’t been able to talk to Malfoy and ask him about it.”

“Do you want to talk about it? Sometimes it helps to talk about things out loud.”

Harry opened the folder and handed the photos and the newspaper clippings to her. When she looked at the photo of the young man, her eyes widened.

“Wow. It certainly looks like Malfoy.” She turned the photo and looked at the inscription at the back. “Interesting.”

“What is it?” He said.

“When did you find it?”

“Three days ago.”

She smiled. “This photo was taken exactly 100 years ago.”
Harry frowned and fixed his gaze on the photograph; the unwavering gaze of the man was disconcerting. Then he blinked, and Harry startled because he had thought the photo was muggle. He took it and looked closely at it. The man was motionless for a little while until he blinked again, then he reached with his free hand to lift his sleeve. Before the loop restarted, he was able to glimpse the tail of the serpent of Malfoy’s faded Dark Mark.

“Holy shit.”

trail.content_raw:
A matter of time

blog.description: Blog created on July 15, 2018. Just two young women in love with the Harry Potter series. Ravenclaw and Slytherin, respectively. {REQUESTS ARE CLOSED}

blog.name: hisshisssssss
blog.title: Hissss
blog.description: An obvious trash for Drarry and maybe other OTPs | BOTTOM DRACO | feel free to ask me | she | i love matcha | currently is not capable of writing fanfictions | please credit me if you take my post elsewhere | If you have any problems with bottom Draco or prefer bottom Harry, I’m sorry this blog is not for you, otherwise welcome~

summary:
Harry: im gonna say it Draco
Draco: no
Harry: the compass always points to the North
Draco: no, dont you dare say the next...
body:
Harry: im gonna say it Draco

Draco: no

Harry: the compass always points to the North

Draco: no, dont you dare say the next sentence-

Harry: but I always point to your heart

Draco: *blushing furiously* i told you not to say it!!

blog.name: immasydc
blog.title: Life Chapters💞
blog.description:
I'm Masy, a Filipina🇵🇭🇵🇭 Anyways, If you're reading this now, why don't you click the follow button? 💞 
I would like to share my own made short-stories to share and improve my talent... so yeah, feel free to correct my mistakes💞 
I'll share things about my experiences, dramas, stress, positiveness, negativeness ( lol😂 ) , etc.
